name: Assignment 1 (lukephilipps)
description:
Level design assignment done in a week for a Unity class utilizing assets found online.

Controlled using prebuilt player controller (its a little rough but doable with some practice).

Controls-

  • WASD - move player.
  • Space - jump.

Checkpoints and coin mechanics programmed by myself. Try to find the secret area! Utilize S to break when making tight movement as the car controls are a little tough to get used to with the ball.

Unfortunately I ran out of time and didn't add a way to exit the game. Press alt+f4 to exit.
